message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more to account for inflation.
Your cut decreases each round with inflation Alice. I'm feeling generous.
Don't be shortsighted Bob. This is a good deal for both of us in the long run.
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a fair offer while accounting for the time pressure.
Okay Bob, let's settle this. We both know time is against me.
Let's stop wasting time, Alice. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.
